ModMetaData.name: Simple Chains: Leather Additional Patch
ModMetaData.author: slapMyMarsupial
ModMetaData.description:
Rimworld 1.1 Last Update 3/22/20
Owlchemist did an incredible job on the leather overhaul system Simple Chains: Leather which addresses all the base game leathers plus leathers found within many other mods.
Where Owlchemist left off, I've expanded compatibility to additional mods that have unique animals and leathers ready for the tanning vat!
In all, the below mods have been overhauled so far
Simple Chains: Leather includes:
1. Alpha Animals 2. AnimalCollabProj 3. Frilleus 4. Rodents of Unusual Size 5. Sacred WhiteFox 6. Vanilla Animals Expanded — Arid Shrubland 7. Vanilla Animals Expanded — Desert 8. Vanilla Animals Expanded — Livestock
Simple Chains: Leather Additional Patch includes:
9. Alpha Animals [there was one leather not included in Owlchemist's base mod] 10. Call of Cthulhu - Cosmic Horrors 11. Dinosauria 12. Dragon Mod 13. FishIndustry 14. [RF] Fishing [1.0] 15. Flommel 16. [1.0]Lost Forest 17. Magical Menagerie 18. MoreMonstergirls - Foxgirl 19. MoreMonstergirls Enhanced Version 1.0 20. Rim of Madness - Arachnophobia 21. Vanilla Animals Expanded — Arid Shrubland 22. Vanilla Animals Expanded — Ice Sheet 23. Vanilla Animals Expanded — Tropical Rainforest 24. Jurassic Rimworld 1.0 25. Vanilla Animals Expanded — Australia 26. Donkeys 27. Beast Man Tribes 28. Martens - Nature's Most Adorable Assassins 29. Giraffes 30. Fantasy Goblins 31. Black Widows 2.0 32. Dragon's Descent
Let me know if there's additional leathers out there that we need to bring out of the fold ^.^
Happy Hiding out there!
